articles.description: Rafael Nadal is immortalised forever in steel at Roland Garros - but this French Open is likely to be the 14-time champion's last.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Rafael Nadal set for final Roland Garros

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler continues his rise with his first major PDC title, beating Luke Humphries in the Premier League Darts final.
articles.title: Luke Littler: Teenager wins Premier League Darts title to continue rise

articles.description: Ipswich’s Kieran McKenna, Leicester's Enzo Maresca and Brentford’s Thomas Frank are on Chelsea's shortlist to replace Mauricio Pochettino.
articles.title: Chelsea manager: Kieran McKenna, Enzo Maresca & Thomas Frank on shortlist

articles.description: England comfortably beat Pakistan by 37 runs in the opening one-day international at Derby.
articles.title: England v Pakistan: Hosts win ODI series opener despite unconvincing performance

articles.description: Wayne Rooney is set to have talks with Championship side Plymouth Argyle about their vacant head coach role.
articles.title: Wayne Rooney: Former England striker set for managerial talks with Plymouth Argyle

articles.description: Dash-cam footage shows World No. 1 golfer Scottie Scheffler arrested by Louisville Police.
articles.title: Golfer Scottie Scheffler arrested by Louisville Police

articles.description: Max Verstappen says this weekend’s Monaco Grand Prix will be “one of the more difficult races” for his Red Bull team.
articles.title: Max Verstappen: Monaco Grand Prix could be more difficult race for Red Bull

articles.description: The police officer who arrested world number one Scottie Scheffler last week has been disciplined for not activating his body-worn camera.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler: Arresting officer disciplined for failing to turn on body-worn camera

articles.description: Rafael Nadal starts what is expected to be his final French Open with a tough first-round draw against fourth seed Alexander Zverev.
articles.title: French Open 2024 draw: Rafael Nadal plays Alexander Zverev, Andy Murray faces Stan Wawrinka

articles.description: Star players have come and gone, but through Manchester United and Manchester City's Premier League rivalry, two local brothers have documented the characters and the chaos.
articles.title: FA Cup final: Manchester City v Manchester United - a rivalry
